Sun, 16 Jun 2024 02:36:25 +0000 Parents who paid to send their children to a Nasa space camp in Houston have been left stranded after Actura went bankrupt.

Illustration / Anna Crichton

Ponsonby shooting: Police investigate whether revolver found in Lake Taupō was murder weapon https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-shooting-police-investigate-whether-revolvers-found-in-lake-taupo-were-murder-weapon/L6EQI5GKGFHQXAGRSIZHWHXHDE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-shooting-police-investigate-whether-revolvers-found-in-lake-taupo-were-murder-weapon/L6EQI5GKGFHQXAGRSIZHWHXHDE/ George Block, Jared SavageThey are cut-down Alfa Carbines, which have fast become the favoured gun for gang members. Sat, 15 Jun 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Hone Kay-Selwyn, who opened fire on Ponsonby Rd on May 5, 2024 killing Robert Sidney Horne, poses with a pistol and a wad of cash. Police have now found two pistols they believe could have been used in the killing in Lake Taupo. Photo / Supplied
